plot: A magical TV remote control sends Bubba and Leroy tumbling into an un-PC TV land where the channel keeps changing and the shows get more and more bizarre.
title: Universal Remote
plot_es: A magical TV remote control sends Bubba and Leroy tumbling into an un-PC TV land where the channel keeps changing and the shows get more and more bizarre.
plot_en: A magical TV remote control sends Bubba and Leroy tumbling into an un-PC TV land where the channel keeps changing and the shows get more and more bizarre.

cast.role: The Black Suit /              B-Dogg /              Arguing Man /              Man In Love
cast.name: Affion Crockett
